skill_constraints: Single points of failure in Frontend and DevOps; Lead Backend dev is a bottleneck.
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive prioritization and knowledge sharing sessions.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for the new developer.
mitigation_strategies: Offload CRUD tasks to new backend developer, freeing up Lead for complex work.

scenario_name: Augmented Team (+1 Mid Backend, +1 Contract Frontend) - Highly Accelerated
skill_constraints: High coordination overhead; risk of contractor integration issues.
mitigation_strategies: Dedicated daily standups for frontend team; clear API contracts.
